title: Manage Manifests for URL Boards in the Pins Package
Manage Manifests for URL Boards in the Pins Package
text: Let’s say pins::board_folder() want serve website, perhaps using GitHub. can write manifest file pins using pin_write_manifest(): writes manifest file, pins.txt root directory board. stores names pins names version pin. Note: pin_write_manifest() supports boards created using pins::board_folder().
code: board <- pins::board_folder("/some/path")  # add/update pins  pin_write_manifest(board) #> Manifest file written to `/some/path/pins.txt`

title: Manage Manifests for URL Boards in the Pins Package
text: create pins::board_url(), need named character-vector : names names pins values URLs point version-directory problem names version directories , design, hard predict manage manually. manifest file, pins.txt can help. call board_url_manifest(), downloads pins.txt, parses provide information build pins::board_url(). demonstration board provided using url_demo_manifest():
code: board_demo <- board_url_manifest(url_demo_manifest())  pins::pin_list(board_demo) #> [1] "mtcars-csv"  "mtcars-json" pins::pin_meta(board_demo, "mtcars-json") #> List of 11 #>  $ file       : chr "mtcars-json.json" #>  $ file_size  : 'fs_bytes' int 4.05K #>  $ pin_hash   : chr "c2702fb156ba5c38" #>  $ type       : chr "json" #>  $ title      : chr "mtcars-json: a pinned 32 x 11 data frame" #>  $ description: NULL #>  $ created    : POSIXct[1:1], format: "2022-08-06 19:58:00" #>  $ api_version: num 1 #>  $ user       : list() #>  $ name       : chr "mtcars-json" #>  $ local      :List of 4 #>   ..$ dir     : 'fs_path' chr "~/Library/Caches/pins/url/94f8727184d79b18fa08f804cec2f2d5" #>   ..$ url     : chr "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ijlyttle/pinsManifest/main/tests/testthat/pins/mtcars-json/20220807T005818Z-c2702/" #>   ..$ version : NULL #>   ..$ file_url: chr "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ijlyttle/pinsManifest/main/tests/testthat/pins/mtcars-json/20220807T005818Z-c"| __truncated__

title: Manage Manifests for URL Boards in the Pins Package

title: Create a URL board with a manifest — board_url_manifest
Create a URL board with a manifest — board_url_manifest
text: url root URL board cache Cache path. Every board requires local cache avoid downloading files multiple times. default stores standard cache location operating system, can override needed. use_cache_on_failure pin fails download, ok use last cached version? Defaults is_interactive() robust poor internet connectivity exploring interactively, get clear errors code deployed.

title: Create a URL board with a manifest — board_url_manifest
code: board <- board_url_manifest(url_demo_manifest()) pins::pin_list(board) #> [1] "mtcars-csv"  "mtcars-json" pins::pin_meta(board, "mtcars-csv") #> List of 11 #>  $ file       : chr "mtcars-csv.csv" #>  $ file_size  : 'fs_bytes' int 1.27K #>  $ pin_hash   : chr "48c73eef04b242dd" #>  $ type       : chr "csv" #>  $ title      : chr "mtcars-csv: a pinned 32 x 11 data frame" #>  $ description: NULL #>  $ created    : POSIXct[1:1], format: "2022-08-07 00:58:00" #>  $ api_version: num 1 #>  $ user       : list() #>  $ name       : chr "mtcars-csv" #>  $ local      :List of 4 #>   ..$ dir     : 'fs_path' chr "~/.cache/pins/url/83f7226c0947abf7e35fce5608fc4c04" #>   ..$ url     : chr "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ijlyttle/pinsManifest/main/tests/testthat/pins/mtcars-csv/20220807T005820Z-48c73/" #>   ..$ version : NULL #>   ..$ file_url: chr "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ijlyttle/pinsManifest/main/tests/testthat/pins/mtcars-csv/20220807T005820Z-48"| __truncated__

title: pinsManifest 0.0.0.9000
text: Added public-facing functions (#1): pin_write_manifest(): given board_folder() write manifest file (pins.txt) pins versions, root directory. board_url_manifest(): given URL (site manifest), returns pins::board_url(). url_demo_manifest(): returns URL demonstration board manifest. manifest_latest(): given url, returns named character vector pin-URLs can used build pins::board_url(). Added internal functions (#2). Added NEWS.md file track changes package.
